ing: 1 lime, juiced, or more to taste
1 jalapeno pepper, seeded and minced, or to taste
des: "Tangy, flavorful, and absolutely delicious! This is by far the best guacamole I have ever tried. Everyone always asks me for the recipe. To prevent guacamole from browning put the avocado seed in the middle of the guacamole."
ins:
Mix avocado, red onion, cilantro, feta cheese, lime juice, jalapeno pepper, salt, and tomato together in a bowl.
Chill in refrigerator for 1 hour before serving.
